EmailTemplate.name: 201906_Global_IMU_Nurture Email_JRD.201906_Global_IMU_Nurture Email_JRD_V2
EmailTemplate.subject: Watch: Honeywell HG4930 IMU Survives Hockey Hits
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sGWuTsv5rBs]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
At Honeywell, we strive to produce high-performance, non-ITAR, inertial measurement units and inertial navigation systems.
We take performance standards seriously, so we personally test each of our products in real world situations to give you the confidence you need to buy from us.
Recently, we put our quality standards to the test to demonstrate how rugged our HG4930 IMU <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/navigation-and-sensors/hg4930]]> is by letting college hockey players hit on the ice at speeds up to 80 mph.
You can watch the video here to see it for yourself <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sGWuTsv5rBs]]>.
For a limited time, you can try a Honeywell IMU or navigator before you buy* to learn how our products can improve your design.
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/IMU_V1.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_imu_gh&utm_content=marketo]]>
*Try before you buy program is subject to availability and execution of Honeywell’s bailment agreement. Limit one (1) product per customer. Customer must return unit in 30 days from the time the unit is received. Customers who do not return the unit within 30 days will be charged full MSRP at standard Honeywell terms and conditions.
